news_header: Kon.ranes reports strong financial performance in Q3.
news_text: In the period from July to September, Kon.ranes achieved an operating profit of approximately EUR 138 million, reflecting a year-on-year growth. The company's net sales reached around EUR 1 billion, marking a 6.4% increase. Orders received amounted to approximately EUR 960 million, growing by 12% year-on-year. Kon.ranes anticipates continued strong demand from industrial customers and expects overall turnover for the current year to surpass last year's figures.
